org.jemmy.fx

Class Root

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jemmy.lookup.AbstractParent<javafx.scene.Scene>
      • org.jemmy.fx.Root
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jemmy.interfaces.ControlInterface, org.jemmy.interfaces.Parent<javafx.scene.Scene>, org.jemmy.interfaces.TypeControlInterface<javafx.scene.Scene>

    public class Root
extends org.jemmy.lookup.AbstractParent<javafx.scene.Scene>
    Root class for Java FX scene lookup. It also serves as an access point for different environment settings.
    Author:
    shura
